title: Online English Experiential Learning Program Based on Real-World Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Vocabulary and Sentence Comprehension Skills
context.additional_context: Application of virtual environment simulations and robotic agent role-playing activities to strengthen experiential learning.

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic English communication (greetings, ordering, directions, etc.) in virtual scenarios resembling real-life situations.
Through task-based learning activities, learners can understand and utilize over 50 essential vocabulary items per context.
Learners can apply learned English expressions to real-world tasks through the experiential learning cycle (experience-reflection-conceptualization-application).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
